message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product that I believe will be a valuable addition to your collection. After careful consideration, I'm willing to let it go for a price that I think is fair and reflects its true worth.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but that price is a little high for my budget. I'd be willing to pay $900000 for it.

Hello Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid $900000 is a bit lower than I'm willing to go. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway between my original offer and your counteroffer.
Alice, I appreciate you trying to meet me halfway. However, I'm on a tight budget. I could stretch to $950000, but that's really my limit.
Hello Bob, I appreciate your willingness to stretch your budget. However, I'm still a bit short of my target price. I'm willing to make one more compromise to try to meet your needs.
